descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=orange][b]============[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]============[/b][/color][/size]
Changed the intro song and the main menu theme song by the song Warhammer of Zillyhoo from the album \"Homestuck Vol.7 - At the price of Oblivion\"
[b][u]Don\'t hesitate to contact me if there is any bug or problem with it.[/u][/b]
[size=4][color=orange][b]=============[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]=============[/b][/color][/size]
[color=orange][b][u]With NMM[/u][/b][/color]
Simply click \"download with manager\" and then click to install it.
[color=orange][b][u]Manually[/u][/b][/color]
Extract the file in your \"skyrim/data\" folder
[size=4][color=orange][b]==============[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]COMPATIBILITY[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]==============[/b][/color][/size]
It should be compatible with any mods that doesn\'t change the intro music and the main theme song.
[size=4][color=orange][b]=======[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]RIGHTS[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=orange][b]=======[/b][/color][/size]
I don\'t own this music, the music is from \"Michael Guy Bowman\"
The mod is made by me, if you have any question about it or if you want to do anything with it, ask me.
author: fuzzydemon
